lom:description.lom:string: Siggraph website of the use of artificial life techniques in computer animation. The website has sections on the flocking algorithms of Reynolds (herds, flocks and schools), the simulation of the motion of snakes and worms, and the simulation of the behaviors and motion of fish and humans. There is a list of relevant websites and related videos on SigGraph course on Artifical life.

lom:keyword.lom:string: graphs, visual computing, computer animation, artificial life
